Wyndhaven Enclave.name: Wyndhaven Enclave
Wyndhaven Enclave.text: A stronghold of the noble houses, fortified against the darkness beyond.

Ruthless Baroness.name: Ruthless Baroness
Ruthless Baroness.text: Her icy gaze commands the loyalty of the desperate and the depraved.

Underground Kingpin.name: Underground Kingpin
Underground Kingpin.text: Strings of power tug at the shadows, manipulating the flow of coin and goods.

Crown's Secretkeeper.name: Crown's Secretkeeper
Crown's Secretkeeper.text: Whispers and rumors are her currency, trading favors to maintain the monarch's grip on power.

Forgebound Smith.name: Forgebound Smith
Forgebound Smith.text: Tempered in the heart of the forge, her weapons are as lethal as they are beautiful.

Guild Enforcer.name: Guild Enforcer
Guild Enforcer.text: Brutal and unyielding, the Guild's enforcers maintain order through fear and intimidation.

Plague Doctor.name: Plague Doctor
Plague Doctor.text: Garbed in the dark robes of a healer, but harboring a sinister purpose.

Bandit Outlaw.name: Bandit Outlaw
Bandit Outlaw.text: A life on the wrong side of the law has honed her skills, but hardened her heart.

Banshee's Wail.name: Banshee's Wail
Banshee's Wail.text: A chilling cry that pierces the veil, heralding the arrival of the restless dead.

Bone Collector.name: Bone Collector
Bone Collector.text: Gathering the remains of the fallen, empowered by the spirits of the departed.

Bow Marshal.name: Bow Marshal
Bow Marshal.text: A skilled archer sworn to defend the realm, ever vigilant against unseen threats.

Castle Ward.name: Castle Ward
Castle Ward.text: Stalwart defenders of the keep, their blades and shields form an unyielding bulwark.

Court Alchemist.name: Court Alchemist
Court Alchemist.text: Concocting potent elixirs and volatile compounds, a master of the arcane.

Crypt Creeper.name: Crypt Creeper
Crypt Creeper.text: A ghastly apparition, drawn from the depths of the earth to do its master's bidding.

Cursed Squire.name: Cursed Squire
Cursed Squire.text: A knight's former companion, haunting the mortal realm, cursed to remain earthbound.

Dire Wolf.name: Dire Wolf
Dire Wolf.text: A massive, savage predator prowling the wilderness, driven by an insatiable hunger.

Ghoul Vanguard.name: Ghoul Vanguard
Ghoul Vanguard.text: Decaying corpses, animated by dark magic, serve as the first line of defense.

Ghostly Raider.name: Ghostly Raider
Ghostly Raider.text: The restless spirit of a fallen soldier, compelled to haunt the mortal realm.

Graveyard Sentinel.name: Graveyard Sentinel
Graveyard Sentinel.text: A guardian from beyond the veil, tasked with protecting the sanctity of the dead.

Highland Scout.name: Highland Scout
Highland Scout.text: Skilled in the ways of the wilderness, a keen observer of the land and its secrets.

Highwayman's Ambush.name: Highwayman's Ambush
Highwayman's Ambush.text: A sudden strike from the shadows, preying on the unwary and the vulnerable.

Jousting Champion.name: Jousting Champion
Jousting Champion.text: A skilled warrior renowned for her prowess in the tournament, a master of the lance.

Mercenary Captain.name: Mercenary Captain
Mercenary Captain.text: Leading a band of hardened soldiers, her loyalty lies with the highest bidder.

Mournful Spirit.name: Mournful Spirit
Mournful Spirit.text: A sorrowful wraith, forever haunted by the anguish of its mortal existence.

Necromancer of the Forgotten Depths.name: Necromancer of the Forgotten Depths
Necromancer of the Forgotten Depths.text: A master of the dark arts, commanding the legions of the undead from the deepest chasms.

Necromancer of the Vale.name: Necromancer of the Vale
Necromancer of the Vale.text: A twisted practitioner of necromantic sorcery, raising the dead to do her bidding.

Necropolis Guard.name: Necropolis Guard
Necropolis Guard.text: Skeletal sentinels, sworn to protect the sacred crypts and tombs from desecration.

Phantom Steed.name: Phantom Steed
Phantom Steed.text: A ghostly mount, summoned from the ether to carry its rider into the fray.

Revenant Archer.name: Revenant Archer
Revenant Archer.text: A restless spirit, wielding a bow with unerring accuracy, driven by an undying purpose.

Royal Falconer.name: Royal Falconer
Royal Falconer.text: A skilled hunter, commanding a fierce raptor as an extension of her own will.

Shadow of the Past.name: Shadow of the Past
Shadow of the Past.text: A spectral echo, whispers of a bygone era, haunting the present with memories of the past.

Siege Engineer.name: Siege Engineer
Siege Engineer.text: A master of siege weaponry, capable of raining destruction upon the enemy's fortifications.

Skeletal Knight.name: Skeletal Knight
Skeletal Knight.text: A fallen champion, returned from the grave, driven by an undying loyalty to its lord.

Spectral Ferryman.name: Spectral Ferryman
Spectral Ferryman.text: A ghostly figure, tasked with guiding the souls of the departed across the river Styx.

Tomb Warden.name: Tomb Warden
Tomb Warden.text: An ancient guardian, sworn to protect the sanctity of the dead and the secrets they hold.

Undead Creature.name: Undead Creature
Undead Creature.text: A shambling husk, animated by dark magic, driven by an insatiable hunger for the living.

Village Blacksmith.name: Village Blacksmith
Village Blacksmith.text: A skilled artisan, forging sturdy blades and armor to equip the defenders of the realm.

Wandering Minstrel.name: Wandering Minstrel
Wandering Minstrel.text: A traveling bard, weaving tales of heroism and tragedy, bringing news and entertainment.

Icelord of Despair.name: Icelord of Despair
Icelord of Despair.text: A cruel and relentless tyrant, his icy grip extends over the frozen wastes, crushing all who stand in his path.
